code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Railway as Railway Platform
    participant Main as main.py
    participant Lifespan as mongodb.py (Education_GradeSync)
    participant MongoDB as MongoDB

    Railway->>Main: Start container
    Main->>Lifespan: Enter lifespan context
    Lifespan->>MongoDB: Connect (Education_LMS_Portal)
    MongoDB-->>Lifespan: Connection established
    Lifespan->>MongoDB: Ping (Education_LMS_Portal)
    MongoDB-->>Lifespan: Pong
    Lifespan->>Main: Attach app.mongodb, app.mongo_dal
    Main->>Main: Add CORS middleware
    Main->>Main: Include router
    Main-->>Railway: Server ready on 0.0.0.0:8000
repo_description: This repo contains a multi-agent system with multiple AI models that serves to be an assistant about me and my professional experience.

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我们从头开始，先确定入口点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 这个系统主要由Enter lifespan context、Connect (Education_LMS_Portal)组成。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 这个设计看起来不错。

dialogue.utterance: 确认一下，Ping (Education_LMS_Portal)、Attach app.mongodb, app.mongo_dal是正确的吧？
